jsocket.net

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsocket.net.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCPConnection, UDPConnection

    public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Base class of hierarchy This class represents either a UDP or TCP based connection

      • setBufferSize

        public abstract void setBufferSize(int bufferSize)
        Sets the buffer size for underlying implementation. Note: UDPConnection forces buffer size of 512, which is size of packet
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - number of bytes to allocate for buffer.

      • throwIfSocketTimedOut

        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:

      • getInstance

        public static Connection getInstance(java.io.Closeable conn)
        Gets an instance of a Connection based subtype of Closeable. If Closeable of type Socket, a TCP based connection will be returned. Otherwise if it is of type DatagramSocket, a UDP based connection will be returned
        Parameters:
        conn - raw socket
        Returns:
        a new Connection
